Articles.Content: I wish you could reposition the nav-ball by dragging it to wherever you want it, and perhaps make it slightly larger, and maybe even make an option to make it semi transparent.

Moved to suggestions/discussions.

Can't help with the others, WetJet, but you can change the size of the UI displays with a slider on the game's settings screens.

I agree with this one every time it's brought up

And I too wish you could change the size of the navball independently of the rest of the gui.

I'd like to be able to be more efficient with nodes by being able to zoom in on the center of the navball. As it is, targeting the center of mass for a large asteroid is not easy because you can have that little gold dot right inside the pink dot of the target, but still end up pointed far enough off-center to get a spinning asteroid (which is why a lot of us pull them instead of push).
